description: Detects process start from rare or uncommon folders like temporary folder or folders that usually don't contain executable files
name: Process Start From Suspicious Folder
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet*) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\cleanmgr.exe" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\Installer\\resources\\app\\ServiceHub\\Services\\Microsoft.VisualStudio.Setup.Service\\BackgroundDownload.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\dxgiadaptercache.exe") OR process.parent.executable.text:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\NVIDIA\ Corporation\\*) OR (process.executable.text:*setup.exe) OR (process.executable.text:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\Temp\\* AND process.executable.text:*.tmp\\MicrosoftEdgeUpdate.exe))))
author: frack113
